# <a name="how-to-view-outlookcom-message-headers-or-message-source"></a>如何查看 Outlook.com 邮件头或邮件源

若要在电子邮件中查看邮件头和其他详细信息，请选择三个点 <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 At the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.
